name: Dawn Earth
description:
The year is 2175, the world is in the brink of nuclear war when an unknown alien species invades the planet. All cities are turned to dust, the few survivors are trying to escape Earth and go to a colony in hopes to survive.

Your mission is to help these survivors escape with the hope to strike back at the aliens and retake our planet.

Features:

- High-definition graphics and sound.

- Fully orchestrated soundtrack and 3D sound.
